TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit ParameterBuilder extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._ParameterBuilder

span.span: Creates or associates parameter information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數屬性需要一致的方法簽章。Parameter attributes need to consistent with the method signature. 如果您指定`Out`參數的屬性，您應該確定該方法參數的型別是`ByRef`型別。If you specify `Out` attributes for a parameter, you should ensure that the type of that method parameter is a `ByRef` type. 有些屬性需要您呼叫可行的參數，才可在執行階段正常運作的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)。Some attributes require that you call with viable parameters in order for the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) to work correctly at runtime. 比方說，如果您定義與參數 1 ParameterAttributes.Out `MethodBuilder`，然後參數 1 的必須是參考，例如 Type.GetType ("System.String &")，而不是 Type.GetType("System.String")。For example, if you define a with ParameterAttributes.Out for parameter 1 of a `MethodBuilder`, then parameter 1 of must be a reference such as Type.GetType("System.String&"), rather than Type.GetType("System.String"). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用利用參考傳遞的參數建立動態方法`ParameterBuilder`。The following example demonstrates how to create a dynamic method with a parameter passed by reference using `ParameterBuilder`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetConstant (object defaultValue);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetConstant(object defaultValue) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub SetConstant (defaultValue As Object)
public: virtual void SetConstant(System::Object ^ defaultValue);
abstract member SetConstant : obj -> unit override this.SetConstant : obj -> unit

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 這個參數的預設值。

span.span: The default value of this parameter.
Sets the default value of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `defaultValue` 僅限於下列類型： `Boolean`， `SByte`， `Int16`， `Int32`， `Int64`， `Byte`， `UInt16`， `UInt32`， `UInt64`， `Single`， `Double`， `DateTime``Char`， `String`，和`Enum`。`defaultValue` is restricted to the following types: `Boolean`, `SByte`, `Int16`, `Int32`, `Int64`, `Byte`, `UInt16`, `UInt32`, `UInt64`, `Single`, `Double`, `DateTime`, `Char`, `String`, and `Enum`. CLS 合規性的參數型別是參考型別，如果需要`defaultValue`要`null`。If the parameter type is a reference type, CLS compliance requires `defaultValue` to be `null`. 不過，從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，`defaultValue`可以為非 null 的參考類型，只要此值可以指派給該參考型別。However, starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], `defaultValue` can be non-null for a reference type as long as the value can be assigned to that reference type. 例如，`Int32`值可以指派給類型參數的。For example, an `Int32` value can be assigned to a parameter of type . 這不符合 CLS 標準，但它可以是在 interop 的案例中很有用。This is not CLS-compliant, but it can be useful in interop scenarios.

exception.span: 參數不是其中一個支援的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not one of the supported types.
-or-

exception.span: 的型別不符合參數的型別。

span.span: The type of does not match the type of the parameter.
-or-

exception.span: 參數的型別是 或其他參考型別、 不是 ，而且無法將此值指派給參考型別。

span.span: The parameter is of type or other reference type, is not , and the value cannot be assigned to the reference type.
Sets a custom attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有關如何格式化，請參閱 ECMA 第二篇文件，如需詳細資料中的中繼資料規格`binaryAttribute`。See the metadata specification in the ECMA Partition II documentation for details on how to format `binaryAttribute`. 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

param.span: 保留供未來使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

span.span: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是用於存取 managed 類別，並不會呼叫從 managed 程式碼。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需詳細資訊`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
